description.p: predicts the concept in ontology associated to each term in termLayer.
uses a classifier specified by regressionMatrix that must have been produced by ContesTrain.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: conceptFeature
param-doc.p: Feature of the term where to store the predicted concept.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process documents that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: formFeature
param-doc.p: Feature to use as word form.

param-doc.name: ontology
param-doc.p: Path to the ontology file in OBO or OWL format.

param-doc.name: regressionMatrix
param-doc.p: Path to the classifier file produced by ContesTrain.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: termLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer that contain terms.

param-doc.name: tokenLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing token annotations.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.

param-doc.name: wordEmbeddings
param-doc.p: Path to the file containing word embeddings, as produced by Word2Vec.
